labels.label: Writes the list of file processor ids to pickle file which is specific to your app
Write the my_app processors id list to the pickle file
logs which is not specific to your app will get killed here
tailFile is scheduled to run on every 10 secs, you can change this based on requirement
simulate the sample logs for testing
Trigger alerts and capture logs in real time
mergeContent runs every 2 mins or if the flowfile entries reach 1000
